Package leitej.util.data

Class BinaryConcat

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.util.data.BinaryConcat
  • public final class BinaryConcat
extends java.lang.Object
    An useful class to help in concatenating bits and bytes.
    Author:
    Julio Leite
